verses.verse: Now it came to pass <S%H8085><s%>, when it was reported to Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> and Tobiah <S%H2900><s%>, and to Geshem <S%H1654><s%> the Arabian <S%H6163><s%>, and unto the rest <S%H3499><s%> of our enemies <S%H341><s%>, that I had builded <S%H1129><s%> the wall <S%H2346><s%>, and that there was no breach <S%H6556><s%> left <S%H3498><s%> therein <S%H1571><s%>; (though even unto that time <S%H6256><s%> I had not set up <S%H5975><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> in the gates <S%H8179><s%>;)

that Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> and Geshem <S%H1654><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying, Come <S%H3212><s%>, let us meet <S%H3259><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> in one of the villages <S%H3715><s%> in the plain <S%H1237><s%> of Ono <S%H207><s%>. But they thought <S%H2803><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> me mischief <S%H7451><s%>.

And I sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, saying, I am doing <S%H6213><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> work <S%H4399><s%>, so that I cannot <S%H3201><s%> come down <S%H3381><s%>: why should the work <S%H4399><s%> cease <S%H7673><s%>, whilst <S%H834><s%> I leave <S%H7503><s%> it <S%H3381><s%>, and come down to you?
And they sent <S%H7971><s%> unto me four <S%H702><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> after this sort <S%H1697><s%>; and I answered <S%H7725><s%> them after the same manner <S%H1697><s%>.

Then sent <S%H7971><s%> Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> his servant <S%H5288><s%> unto me in like manner <S%H1697><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%> time <S%H6471><s%> with an open <S%H6605><s%> letter <S%H107><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>,

wherein was written <S%H3789><s%>, It is reported <S%H8085><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and Gashmu <S%H1654><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> it <S%H3064><s%>, that thou and the Jews think <S%H2803><s%> to rebel <S%H4775><s%>; for which cause <S%H3651><s%> thou art building <S%H1129><s%> the wall <S%H2346><s%>: and thou wouldest be <S%H1933><s%> their king <S%H4428><s%>, according to these words <S%H1697><s%>.

And thou hast also appointed <S%H5975><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%> to preach <S%H7121><s%> of thee at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, There is a king <S%H4428><s%> in Judah <S%H3063><s%>: and now shall it be reported <S%H8085><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> according to these words <S%H1697><s%>. Come <S%H3212><s%> now therefore <S%H3289><s%>, and let us take counsel together <S%H3162><s%>.

Then I sent <S%H7971><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, saying, There are <S%H1961><s%> no such things <S%H1697><s%> done <S%H1961><s%> as thou sayest <S%H559><s%>, but thou feignest <S%H908><s%> them out of thine own heart <S%H3820><s%>.

For they all would have made us afraid <S%H3372><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Their hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be weakened <S%H7503><s%> from the work <S%H4399><s%>, that it be not done <S%H6213><s%>. But now <S%H2388><s%>, O God, strengthen thou my hands <S%H3027><s%>.

And I went <S%H935><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Delaiah <S%H1806><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mehetabel <S%H4105><s%>, who was shut up <S%H6113><s%>; and he said <S%H559><s%>, Let us meet together <S%H3259><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, within <S%H8432><s%> the temple <S%H1964><s%>, and let us shut <S%H5462><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> of the temple <S%H1964><s%>: for they will come <S%H935><s%> to slay <S%H2026><s%> thee <S%H3915><s%>; yea, in the night will they come <S%H935><s%> to slay thee <S%H2026><s%>.

And I said <S%H559><s%>, Should such <S%H3644><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> as I flee <S%H1272><s%>? and who is there <S%H935><s%>, that, being such as I, would go into the temple <S%H1964><s%> to save his life <S%H2425><s%>? I will not go in <S%H935><s%>.

And I discerned <S%H5234><s%>, and <S%H430><s%>, lo, God had not sent <S%H7971><s%> him <S%H1696><s%>; but he pronounced this prophecy <S%H5016><s%> against me <S%H2900><s%>: and Tobiah and Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> had hired him <S%H7936><s%>.

For this cause was he hired <S%H7936><s%>, that I should be afraid <S%H3372><s%>, and do so <S%H6213><s%>, and sin <S%H2398><s%>, and that they might have matter for an evil <S%H7451><s%> report <S%H8034><s%>, that they might reproach me <S%H2778><s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%>, O my God <S%H430><s%>, Tobiah <S%H2900><s%> and Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> according to these their works <S%H4639><s%>, and also the prophetess <S%H5031><s%> Noadiah <S%H5129><s%>, and the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%>, that would have put me in fear <S%H3372><s%>.

So the wall <S%H2346><s%> was finished <S%H7999><s%> in the twenty <S%H6242><s%> and fifth <S%H2568><s%> day of the month Elul <S%H435><s%>, in fifty <S%H2572><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H341><s%>, when all our enemies heard <S%H8085><s%> thereof <S%H1471><s%>, that all the nations that were about us <S%H5439><s%> feared <S%H7200><s%>, and were much <S%H3966><s%> cast down <S%H5307><s%> in their own eyes <S%H5869><s%>; for they perceived <S%H3045><s%> that this work <S%H4399><s%> was wrought <S%H4399><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>.

Moreover in those days <S%H3117><s%> the nobles <S%H2715><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> sent <S%H1980><s%> many <S%H7235><s%> letters <S%H107><s%> unto Tobiah <S%H2900><s%>, and the letters of Tobiah <S%H2900><s%> came unto them <S%H935><s%>.

For there were many <S%H7227><s%> in Judah <S%H3063><s%> sworn <S%H1167><s%> unto him <S%H2860><s%>, because he was the son-in-law of Shecaniah <S%H7935><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Arah <S%H733><s%>; and his son <S%H1121><s%> Jehohanan <S%H3076><s%> had taken <S%H3947><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Meshullam <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah to wife <S%H1296><s%>.

Also they spake <S%H559><s%> of his good deeds <S%H2896><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me <S%H3318><s%>, and reported my words <S%H1697><s%> to him <S%H2900><s%>. And Tobiah sent <S%H7971><s%> letters <S%H107><s%> to put me in fear <S%H3372><s%>.
